description.zh-cn: 指第二次国共内战后，中华人民共和国政府与中华民国政府在台湾海峡发生的一系列军事及政治对峙与冲突。
description.en: A series of military and political confrontations between the People's Republic of China and the Republic of China across the Taiwan Strait after the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的第二次内战。
description.en: The second civil war in China between the Kuomintang and the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 控制中国大陆的政权。
description.en: The government that controls mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 1949年后控制台湾地区的政权。
description.en: The government that has controlled the Taiwan area since 1949.

description.zh-cn: 1954年至1955年间在台湾海峡发生的一系列军事冲突，主要围绕金门和浙江沿海岛屿展开。
description.en: A series of military conflicts in the Taiwan Strait from 1954 to 1955, primarily focused on Kinmen and the coastal islands of Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由中华民国实际控制的岛屿，靠近中国大陆。
description.en: An island group controlled by the Republic of China, located close to mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 第一次台湾海峡危机期间，解放军对金门发动炮击。
description.en: During the First Taiwan Strait Crisis, the PLA launched an artillery bombardment on Kinmen.

description.zh-cn: 解放军首次陆、海、空三军协同作战，攻占一江山岛。
description.en: The PLA's first joint army-navy-air force operation to capture the Yijiangshan Islands.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，在一江山岛战役中担任指挥官。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army who commanded the Yijiangshan Islands Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，一江山岛指挥官，在战役中阵亡。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Armed Forces and commander of the Yijiangshan Islands, who died in the campaign.

description.zh-cn: 美国的武装力量之一。
description.en: A branch of the United States Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的武装力量之一。
description.en: A branch of the Republic of China Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 在美国海军协助下，中华民国将大陈岛军民撤至台湾的行动。
description.en: The operation by the Republic of China, with the assistance of the U.S. Navy, to evacuate military personnel and civilians from the Dachen Islands to Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 美国第34任总统。
description.en: The 34th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国，一个北美洲国家。
description.en: The United States of America, a country in North America.

description.zh-cn: 1958年发生于台湾海峡的军事冲突，以解放军炮击金门为核心事件。
description.en: A military conflict in the Taiwan Strait in 1958, centered on the PLA's artillery bombardment of Kinmen.

en: Second Taiwan Strait Crisis artillery duel

description.zh-cn: 第二次台湾海峡危机的主要军事行动，解放军对金门进行了大规模炮击。
description.en: The main military action of the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis, in which the PLA conducted a massive artillery bombardment of Kinmen.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，金门防卫司令部副司令官，在金门炮战中阵亡。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Armed Forces and Deputy Commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, killed in action during the Kinmen Artillery Duel.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，金门防卫司令部副司令官，在金门炮战中阵亡。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Armed Forces and Deputy Commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, killed in action during the Kinmen Artillery Duel.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领，金门防卫司令部副司令官，在金门炮战中阵亡。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China Armed Forces and Deputy Commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, killed in action during the Kinmen Artillery Duel.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正时期中华民国政府制定的反攻大陆的军事作战计划。
description.en: A military operation plan formulated by the Republic of China government during the Chiang Kai-shek era to counterattack mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1958年至1962年间推行的经济和社会运动。
description.en: An economic and social campaign by the People's Republic of China from 1958 to 1962.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader who served as the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府在两岸分治后提出的政治与军事口号，旨在收复中国大陆。
description.en: A political and military slogan proposed by the government of the Republic of China after the cross-strait separation, aimed at retaking mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 国光计划期间，中华民国策划的向中国大陆空投特种作战人员的秘密行动。
description.en: A covert operation planned by the Republic of China during Project National Glory to airdrop special operations personnel into mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国情报官员，曾任国防部情报局局长，策划了海威行动。
description.en: An intelligence official of the Republic of China, who served as the director of the Intelligence Bureau of the Ministry of National Defense and planned Operation Hai Wei.

description.zh-cn: 因时任中华民国总统李登辉访问美国，中华人民共和国进行大规模导弹演习引发的危机。
description.en: A crisis triggered by large-scale missile exercises conducted by the People's Republic of China in response to a visit to the United States by then-President of the Republic of China, Lee Teng-hui.

description.zh-cn: 美国第42任总统。
description.en: The 42nd President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约州伊萨卡的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in Ithaca, New York, USA.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与美国政府间签署的三份重要外交文件。
description.en: Three joint statements issued by the governments of the People's Republic of China and the United States.

description.zh-cn: 1990年代台湾海峡两岸两会之间进行的一系列协商与会谈。
description.en: A series of negotiations and talks between the two semi-official organizations of Taiwan and mainland China in the 1990s.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国和中国共产党的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest national military command and control institution of the People's Republic of China and the Chinese Communist Party.

zh-cn: 中华民国首次民选总统大选

description.zh-cn: 中华民国首次举行的总统直接选举。
description.en: The first direct presidential election in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国海军旗下的远洋舰队之一，隶属于美国印太司令部。
description.en: A numbered fleet of the United States Navy, subordinate to the United States Indo-Pacific Command.

description.zh-cn: 因李登辉提出两国论而引发的台海紧张局势。
description.en: Tensions in the Taiwan Strait triggered by Lee Teng-hui's proposal of the 'Two-state theory'.

description.zh-cn: 德国的国际公共广播机构。
description.en: Germany's public international broadcaster.

description.zh-cn: 由时任中华民国总统李登辉提出的关于海峡两岸关系的论述，认为中华人民共和国与中华民国是两个对等的国家。
description.en: A theory on cross-strait relations proposed by then-President Lee Teng-hui, which posits that the PRC and the ROC are two equal states.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 2022年中华人民共和国针对台湾进行的一系列军事演习，部分媒体与学者称之为第四次台海危机。
description.en: A series of military exercises conducted by the People's Republic of China targeting Taiwan in 2022, referred to by some media and scholars as the Fourth Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 台湾海峡危机是第二次国共内战的延续，内战导致的两岸分治是危机产生的背景。
description.en: The Taiwan Strait Crisis is a continuation of the Second Chinese Civil War; the cross-strait separation resulting from the civil war is the background of the crisis.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军对驻守金门的中华民国国军发动了榴弹炮突击，开启了第一次台湾海峡危机。
description.en: The People's Liberation Army launched a howitzer assault on the ROC forces stationed in Kinmen, starting the First Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 时任解放军华东军区参谋长张爱萍统一指挥攻占一江山岛的作战行动。
description.en: Zhang Aiping, then Chief of Staff of the PLA's East China Military Region, commanded the operation to capture the Yijiangshan Islands.

description.zh-cn: 一江山岛指挥官王生明将军在解放军占领该岛后引爆手榴弹自杀。
description.en: General Wang Shengming, commander of the Yijiangshan Islands, committed suicide with a grenade after the PLA captured the island.

description.zh-cn: 美国海军与中华民国海军合作，将大陈岛军民船运撤退至台湾。
description.en: The U.S. Navy and the ROC Navy cooperated to evacuate military personnel and civilians from the Dachen Islands to Taiwan by ship.

description.zh-cn: 美国总统艾森豪威尔表示不排除在远东使用战术核武器，对中华人民共和国形成威慑。
description.en: U.S. President Eisenhower stated he would not rule out the use of tactical nuclear weapons in the Far East, creating a deterrent against the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 在美国发出核威慑后，周恩来声明愿意与美国谈判缓和远东局势，最终结束了危机。
description.en: After the U.S. nuclear deterrent threat, Zhou Enlai stated his willingness to negotiate with the U.S. to ease tensions in the Far East, which ultimately ended the crisis.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军对驻守金门的国军部队发动了榴弹炮突击，引发第二次台湾海峡危机。
description.en: The People's Liberation Army launched a howitzer assault on the ROC forces stationed in Kinmen, triggering the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 金门防卫司令部副司令官吉星文在金门炮战中阵亡。
description.en: Ji Xingwen, Deputy Commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, was killed in action during the Kinmen Artillery Duel.

description.zh-cn: 金门防卫司令部副司令官赵家骧在金门炮战中阵亡。
description.en: Zhao Jiaxiang, Deputy Commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, was killed in action during the Kinmen Artillery Duel.

description.zh-cn: 金门防卫司令部副司令官章杰在金门炮战中阵亡。
description.en: Zhang Jie, Deputy Commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, was killed in action during the Kinmen Artillery Duel.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次台湾海峡危机期间，美国紧急运送AIM-9响尾蛇飞弹给台湾部队，帮助其取得空战优势。
description.en: During the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis, the United States urgently supplied AIM-9 Sidewinder missiles to the Taiwanese forces, helping them gain an advantage in air combat.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进失败导致中国大陆国力虚弱，蒋中正认为这是反攻大陆的良机。
description.en: The failure of the Great Leap Forward weakened mainland China's national strength, which Chiang Kai-shek saw as an opportune moment to counterattack the mainland.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正急欲趁大跃进失败之时反攻大陆，因而制定了国光计划。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek was eager to counterattack the mainland while it was weakened by the failure of the Great Leap Forward, and thus formulated Project National Glory.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国国防部情报局局长叶翔之开始策画「海威」行动。
description.en: Yeh Hsiang-chih, then Director of the Intelligence Bureau of the Ministry of National Defense of the ROC, began planning 'Operation Hai Wei'.

description.zh-cn: 美国总统比尔·克林顿决定允许时任中华民国总统的李登辉访问美国。
description.en: U.S. President Bill Clinton decided to allow then-President of the Republic of China Lee Teng-hui to visit the United States.

description.zh-cn: 李登辉对美国的访问是引发第三次台湾海峡危机的直接导火索。
description.en: Lee Teng-hui's visit to the United States was the direct trigger for the Third Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 针对李登辉访美，中华人民共和国进行了两次大规模导弹实弹发射演习，引发了危机。
description.en: In response to Lee Teng-hui's visit to the US, the People's Republic of China conducted two large-scale live-fire missile exercises, triggering the crisis.

description.zh-cn: 受危机影响，中华人民共和国推迟了第二轮“汪辜会谈”。
description.en: Affected by the crisis, the People's Republic of China postponed the second round of the 'Koo-Wang talks'.

description.zh-cn: 时任中央军委主席江泽民亲临现场观看了军事演习。
description.en: Jiang Zemin, then Chairman of the Central Military Commission, personally observed the military exercises.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国以军事演习吓阻并试图干涉中华民国首次民选总统大选。
description.en: The People's Republic of China used military exercises to intimidate and attempt to interfere with the first democratic presidential election in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国派遣第七舰队航空母舰战斗群协防台湾海峡，以应对危机。
description.en: The United States dispatched the Seventh Fleet's aircraft carrier battle group to help defend the Taiwan Strait in response to the crisis.

description.zh-cn: 李登辉总统在接受德国之声专访时，提出了两国论。
description.en: President Lee Teng-hui proposed the 'Two-state theory' in an interview with Deutsche Welle.

description.zh-cn: 两国论引发了中华人民共和国的不满，导致了1999年的台海危机。
description.en: The 'Two-state theory' caused dissatisfaction in the People's Republic of China, leading to the 1999 Taiwan Strait Crisis.
